[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Get Certified

Dermaplaning Certification

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

You will learn this advanced exfoliation technique ideal for aestheticians looking to add to their service menu or treatment portfolio. This physical exfoliation treatment uses a sterilized surgical blade to remove the top layer of the skin removing dead skin cells and peach fuzz.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Curriculum: Benefits of dermaplaning, Indications and contraindications, Pre-treatment care, Homecare, Treatment interval, Sterilization, Treatment prices, Client consent forms, Treatment protocol, Instructor demonstration, Student application

 

Included:

  • Reusable handheld tool
  • 100 disposable sterile blades

 

4 Hour Course [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Tuition: $500 + HST

 

Private or group classes available

 

$200 Deposit Required.

 

If you are interested in taking 1 or more classes please email us for combination training prices.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

NO REFUNDS OR TRANSFERS DEPOSITS UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE.

*** IMPORTANT: IF YOU FAIL TO ATTEND CLASS, TUITION WILL RESULT IN A LOSS AND NO REFUNDS WILL BE ISSUED. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
